title: Early Celtic Linguistic Evidence from Dacia and Moesia Inferior
abstractText: A monograph in English giving a complete and critical survey of the historiography of the problem of early Celtic-speakers in Romania, Moldova and part of the Ukraine, together with a comprehensive collection of data place and ethnic names recorded by Greek and Latin authors and personal names in Roman inscriptions-verified where necessary on the spot and studied in the light of modern Celtic philology. The audience will be linguists and ancient historians and archaeologists.
